summary.span: 数据绑定列表控件，该控件允许通过为列表中显示的每一项重复指定的模板来自定义布局。

span.span: A data-bound list control that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [数据绑定Data Binding](#data_binding) - [模板Templates](#templates) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 简介Introduction 控件是一个基本的模板化数据绑定列表。The control is a basic templated data-bound list. 它没有内置布局或样式，因此必须在控件的模板中显式声明所有布局、格式和样式标记。It has no built-in layout or styles, so you must explicitly declare all layout, formatting, and style tags within the control's templates. 控件允许您在模板中拆分标记标记。The control allows you to split markup tags across the templates. 若要使用模板创建表，请在中包含开始表标记 (``) ， () 中的单个表行标记， `` 并在中 ( `
`) 。To create a table using templates, include the begin table tag (``) in the , a single table row tag (``) in the , and the end table tag (`
`) in the . 控件没有内置的选定功能或编辑支持。The control has no built-in selection capabilities or editing support. 可以使用 事件处理从模板引发的控件事件到控件。You can use the event to process control events that are raised from the templates to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 数据绑定Data Binding 控件提供了两个属性来支持数据绑定。The control provides two properties to support data binding. 若要将数据绑定到实现接口的任何集合 (如 、或 数组) 或 接口，请使用 属性来指定数据源。To bind data to any collection that implements the interface (such as a , a , or an array), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source. 设置 属性时，必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 若要自动将 控件绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源，请将 属性设置为 要使用的数据源控件的。To automatically bind the control to a data source represented by a data source control, set the property to the of the data source control to use. 设置 属性时， 控件将自动绑定到第一个请求上的指定数据源控件。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control on the first request. 因此，您无需显式调用 方法，除非您已更改控件的数据相关属性 。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method unless you have changed data-related properties of the control. 控件将其 和绑定 到由其 属性或其属性指定的数据源控件声明和引用的数据模型 。A control binds its and to either the data model declared and referenced by its property or the data source control specified by its property. 、 和 不是数据绑定的。The , , and are not data-bound. 如果 已设置控件的数据源但未返回任何数据，则该控件将呈现 和，而不会显示 任何项。If the control's data source is set but no data is returned, the control renders the and with no items. 如果数据源为 `null` ，则 不会呈现。If the data source is `null`, the is not rendered. ## 模板Templates 每个 控件至少必须定义一个 。At a minimum, every control must define an . 不过，下表中所述的其他可选模板可用于自定义列表的外观。However, other optional templates described in the following table can be used to customize the appearance of the list. |模板名称Template name|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定义列表中项的内容和布局。Defines the content and layout of items within the list. 此模板是必需的。This template is required.| ||如果已定义，则确定 (从零开始的奇数索引) 项的内容和布局。If defined, determines the content and layout of alternating (zero-based odd-indexed) items. 如果未定义， 则使用。If not defined, is used.| ||如果已定义，则在项 (和交替项) 之间呈现。If defined, is rendered between items (and alternating items). 如果未定义，则不会呈现分隔符。If not defined, a separator is not rendered.| ||如果已定义，则确定列表标题的内容和布局。If defined, determines the content and layout of the list header. 如果未定义，则不会呈现标头。If not defined, a header is not rendered.| ||如果已定义，则确定列表脚注的内容和布局。If defined, determines the content and layout of the list footer. 如果未定义，则不会呈现脚注。If not defined, a footer is not rendered.| ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                           ``` ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目： [下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192873)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192873). 下面的代码示例演示如何 在一页上使用两个简单控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use two simple controls on a page. 属性用于指定控件的数据源 。The property is used to specify the data source for the control. 第一 种是在表中显示其项; 第二种 是以逗号分隔的列表显示其项。The first displays its items in a table; the second displays its items in a comma-separated list. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Repeater Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Repeater Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Repeater Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Repeater Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定控件的数据源 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source for a control. 属性设置为 用于检索数据的控件的属性。The property is set to the property of the control used to retrieve the data. 加载页面后， 控件将自动绑定到由控件指定的数据源， 并向用户显示数据。When the page is loaded, the control automatically binds to the data source specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[Repeater.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Repeater.DataSourceID/CS/repeater.datasourceidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Repeater.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Repeater.DataSourceID/VB/repeater.datasourceidvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将 控件及其所有子控件绑定到指定数据源。

span.span: Binds the control and all its child controls to the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将属性指定的数据源绑定 到 控件。Use the method to bind the data source specified by the property to the control. 将数据源绑定到 控件时，数据源中的信息将显示在控件中。When you bind a data source to the control, the information in the data source is displayed in the control. 在 数据源中的信息更新后，该方法通常还用于同步数据源和数据列表控件。The method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated. 这允许在数据源中进行任何更改，也可以在数据列表控件中进行更新。This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control. 如果控件的数据源 是由属性指定的 ，则无需显式调用 方法。If the data source for the control is specified by the property, you do not need to explicitly call the method. ASP.NET 自动调用此方法以将指定的数据源控件绑定到 控件。ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便它始终在自定义服务器控件中引发数据绑定事件 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always raises a data binding event in a custom server control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定填充控件的数据源 。Use this property to specify the source of data to populate the control. 可以是的任何 集合，如 用于访问数据库、 或数组或对象的 。The can be any collection such as a for accessing databases, a , or an array, or an object. 设置 属性时，必须手动编写代码以绑定到数据源。When you set the property you must manually write the code to bind to the data source. 如果由属性指定的数据源 包含多个数据源，请使用 属性指定要绑定到控件的特定源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果有 多个表，则必须指定要绑定到控件的表。For example, if you have a with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 指定数据源后，使用 方法将数据源绑定到控件。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 或者，可以使用 属性自动绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 设置 属性时， 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 无需编写显式调用方法的代码， 除非动态更改控件的属性 。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method unless you dynamically change properties of the control. 如果为 属性和属性指定值 ，ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源，并 引发。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在加载页面时指定控件的。The following example demonstrates how to specify the of the control when the page is loaded. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可访问 控件应用于检索其数据源的数据源控件的属性。Use the property to access the property of the data source control that the control should use to retrieve its data source. 属性引用的数据源控件 可以是实现该接口的任何控件 。The data source control that is referenced by the property can be any control that implements the interface. 数据源控件必须与引用它的控件位于同一命名容器中， 或位于控件的父控件中 。The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the control that references it or in a parent control of the control. 当你为属性指定值时 ，控件将 绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you specify a value for the property, the control binds to the specified data source control. 无需编写显式调用方法的代码 。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 或者，可以使用 属性指定要绑定到控件的值的源 。Alternatively, you can use the property to specify the source of values to bind to the control. 数据源必须是实现接口的集合 (如 或 对象) 或 接口。The data source must be a collection that implements the interface (such as the or object) or the interface. 设置 属性时，必须编写代码来执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must write the code to perform the data binding. 如果同时指定了 和属性的值 ，ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源，并 引发异常。If values are specified for both the and properties, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置 为控件的 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to the property of a control. 加载页面后， 控件将绑定到由控件指定的数据源， 并向用户显示数据。When the page is loaded, the control binds to the data source that is specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[Repeater.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Repeater.DataSourceID/CS/repeater.datasourceidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Repeater.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Repeater.DataSourceID/VB/repeater.datasourceidvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性创建一个模板，该模板控制如何显示控件的页脚节 。Use this property to create a template that controls how the footer section of a control is displayed. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 控制控件的页脚的外观 。The following example demonstrates how to use the to control the appearance of the footer for the control. 请注意， 包含表的结束标记 (``) 。Notice that the contains the table's end tag (``). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性创建一个模板，该模板控制如何显示控件中的项 。Use this property to create a template that controls how items in the control are displayed. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用简单的 控件来显示项的表。The following example illustrates how to use a simple control to display a table of items. 请注意，使用 可以显示数据源中的每一项。Notice the use of the to display each item in the data source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用 属性来确定控件是否需要调用 方法以绑定到其指定的数据源。The control uses the property to determine whether the control needs to call the method to bind to its specified data source. 每次在调用方法后，在、或属性上调用 set 访问器 来更改数据源后 ，ASP.NET 会将属性的值设置 为 `true` 。Each time the set accessor is called on either the , , or property to change the data source after the method has already been called, ASP.NET sets the value of the property to `true`. 调用方法时，也将属性的值设置为 `true` 。The value of the property is also set to `true` when the method is called. ASP.NET 在 `false` 调用方法后立即将属性的值设置为 。ASP.NET sets the value of the property to `false` immediately after the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性创建一个模板，该模板控制如何显示各项之间的分隔符。Use the property to create a template that controls how the separator between items is displayed. > [!CAUTION] > 您可以使用 属性来显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意的客户端脚本。You can use the property to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个模板来控制如何显示各项之间的分隔符。The following code example demonstrates how to create a template to control how separators between items are displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Repeater.SeparatorTemplate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Repeater.SeparatorTemplate Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Repeater.SeparatorTemplate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Repeater.SeparatorTemplate Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
